page.title: 03LONG LAWFORD I
page.content: Amenities & Attractions Long Lawford is an attractive village surrounded by pleasant countryside.Some people said that they came to the village for the new private houses being built at the time.There are however council houses for those in search of this type of accomodation.All age groups are catered for and the community is friendly and helpful. There is a good selection of shops including a news-agent's, a grocer's, a flower shop and a small snack-bar / take-away.An hourly bus service, three public houses, a play group, a large park and a British Legion club are also available.
